emails.subject: Quick comparison - how we differ from existing alt data
emails.preview: Not satellite, not credit card, not web traffic
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

Wanted to clarify how ReviewSignal fits into the alt data landscape:

SATELLITE IMAGERY (Orbital Insight, RS Metrics)
+ Good for parking lot counts
- Lagging indicator, weather-dependent
- Expensive ($100k+/year)

CREDIT CARD DATA (Earnest, Second Measure)
+ Transaction-level detail
- Regulatory scrutiny increasing
- Panel bias issues
- Commoditized

WEB TRAFFIC (SimilarWeb)
+ Digital engagement
- Doesn't capture in-store experience
- Easy to game

REVIEWSIGNAL (Consumer Sentiment)
+ Real customer voice - unfiltered feedback
+ Leading indicator (sentiment shifts before sales)
+ Location-level granularity
+ Low regulatory risk (public data)
+ Affordable pilot programs

We're complementary to what you likely already have.

Happy to discuss how other funds are using sentiment data alongside their existing alt data stack.

Simon
